name: Speed Bike Rider 3D Game
description:
Are you bike racing game lover? Here we are giving you new top highway bike riding 3d game 2018, it’s perfect choice for real bike racing game lovers. In this traffic racer game environment you can ride your bike on highway as fast as you can.
While playing this game remember one thing there is traffic around you and your bike in highway, move your bike and save it from the traffic and made your highest bike riding achievement. And share your new top racing game achievement and invite them to join you in this awesome racer game. Select your best bike from lot’s of 3d bikes and ride it on highway or jungle or in night highway environment. We bet you’ll defiantly love this real racer game 2018.
HOW TO PLAY?
• First of all you need to download our awesome new top bike racing 3d game 2018.
• Open game and select your bike to ride with.
• There is an option to choose environment where you want to ride with your bike.
• There is also an option to choose controls according to your satisfaction, you can either tilt controls or touch controls. If you choose tilt controls than you’ll need to tilt your device in left or right direction to move your bike around. Make sure to your collision with traffic to continue your play and set big score on screen. When your bike hit with traffic than game will over.
FEATURES:
• Real highway bike racer environment.
• Real 3d bikes to ride on.
• 4 Awesome 3d Bikes to choose.
• 3 different environment,
o Highway racer environment.
o Night mode
o Jungle environment.
o Hilly environment.
• Awesome background.
• All bikes noise and sounds are added to make you feel real racing.
• Traffic included to race with.
• 3D environment.
• Snow effect added.
• Bike upgrades also there to make your racing game experience to next level.
• The Best thing is that the game is totally free you don’t need to pay single penny to play or for download. Everything is free of cost to make you happy.
